title: SerializedBinaryFuseFilter

BinaryFuseFilterType.description:
BinaryFuseFilterType is an XDR Enum defined as:

```text enum BinaryFuseFilterType { BINARY_FUSE_FILTER_8_BIT = 0, BINARY_FUSE_FILTER_16_BIT = 1, BINARY_FUSE_FILTER_32_BIT = 2 }; ```

ShortHashSeed.description:
ShortHashSeed is an XDR Struct defined as:

```text struct ShortHashSeed { opaque seed[16]; }; ```
